name: Jungel
description:
WARNING: LOUD SOUNDS (nice)

Please, DO NOT PLAY IT (not reversed psychology). If you WOULD want to play da game, here are some instructions:

Move with WASD

Jump with SPACE

Crouch with CTRL

Pick up stuff with LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

Spawn stuff with RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

There are two Beans that will try end your game (Only one can tho)

(not sorry for bad engilsh)
